bike.description: Specialized M4 fully manipulated alloy frame, fully butted, ORE DT, asymmetrical seat stays, forged dropouts w/ replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only

components.description: RockShox Dart 3 SL, 80/100mm, 1 piece magnesium lower, alloy steerer, adj. reb. damping w/ LO and preload adj., size-specific spring rates, disc only
1-1/8" threadless, Campy style semi-cartridge bearings
3D forged alloy, 4-bolt, 7 degree rise, 31.8mm clamp
Butted alloy riserbar, 25mm rise, 660mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 7 degree up sweep
Specialized Enduro, dual compound Kraton, no flange, 131mm
Tektro Auriga Pro, hydraulic disc, dual piston w/ 160mm rotor
Tektro Auriga Pro, hydraulic disc, dual piston w/ 160mm rotor

Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, top swing, bottom pull
Shimano RD-M592 Deore Shadow, long cage
Shimano SL-590 Deore trigger
Shimano HG50, 9-speed, 11-34t
KMC X9 w/ reuseable Missing Link
Shimano FC-M442, Octalink Spline
44A x 32S x 22S replaceable
Shimano BB-ES25, Octalink spline, cartridge bearing, 68mm x 118mm
Alloy body and cage, 9/16"
Alex RHD 26", pinned, alloy double wall, eyelets, 28h front and 32h rear
